Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2013 11:08PM NoMoreMeh wrote: Mary, I was here back in the day when we were both stage 3.  I remember when your family bought the farm and all the work it needed.  I have been away from here for several years and just returned last month.  I am so very sorry to hear this news.  I wish you peace and love as you continue to the next phase, your eternal life.  Many prayers and much love are going with you.  I will pray for your family that they will find comfort and strength in the days ahead. May God be with you all in your time of great need.
